## Course overview

**Course overview of EAS : Seismic Exploration Methods**

*This course contains a comprehensive review of reflection seismology and its applications that includes exploration and monitoring of underground energy storage. The course covers basic aspects of seismic data acquisition & processing and (wave-equation) based imaging and inversion.*
